title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - VelocityOne Flight - Configure a four engine profile
description:
In this video we will look at how you can create your own profile to control an aircraft with four engines, for example the Boeing 747. We will have a look at how you can setup multiple profile which will allow you to make the controls specific for each aircraft.

The software required to use this functionality can be downloaded via the link below:
https://www.turtlebeach.com/pages/velocity-one-flight-sip-connect
